desc: The one-and-only swag store focusing on all L&D professionals. We offer t-shirts, coffee mugs, phone cases, laptop sleeves and tote bags in a true L&D spirit.

layout.text:
Surprise your L&D colleague(s) with a fun (eco) gift while this random guy clearly enjoys his 60-minute mobile learning course.

With every sold item, we donate € 1 to a local charity.
